5731.quoteText: Please note that some parts of our Services may not function properly if use of cookies is refused.
5731.title: Blocking cookies may limit your ability to use the service

tosdr.case: Blocking cookies may limit your ability to use the service

5732.quoteText:
Aside from the rights specifically granted herein, Customer retains ownership of all rights, including intellectual property rights, in the Customer Data.

tl;dr Any data uploaded to or generated on your cloud servers are yours and yours only.
5732.title: You maintain ownership of your data

tosdr.case: You maintain ownership of your data

5733.quoteText: The Customer may terminate the Agreement for any reason by issuing 5 days written notice to UpCloud.
5733.title: You have the right to leave this service at any time

tosdr.case: You have the right to leave this service at any time

5736.quoteText: If UpCloud is involved in a merger, acquisition or asset sale, we may transfer personal data to the third party involved.
5736.title: The service can sell or otherwise transfer your personal data as part of a bankruptcy proceeding or other type of financial transaction.

tosdr.case: The service can sell or otherwise transfer your personal data as part of a bankruptcy proceeding or other type of financial transaction.

5738.quoteText: UpCloud may terminate the Agreement for any reason by issuing 30 days written notice to the Customer.
5738.title: The service gives 30 days of notice before closing your account

tosdr.case: The service gives 30 days of notice before closing your account

5739.quoteText:
The Agreement will be governed by the substantive laws of Finland, with the exception of any conflict of law principles.
Any and all disputes, which the Parties fail to settle amicably, arising out of or relating to the Agreement will be finally settled by arbitration in English language in accordance with the Rules of the Arbitration Institute of the Finland Chamber of Commerce.
5739.title: The court of law governing the terms is in Finland.

tosdr.case: The court of law governing the terms is in location X
tosdr.tldr: The court of law governing the terms is in Finland.

5740.quoteText: Any disputes will be decided in English and by the Finland Chamber of Commerce.</small>
5740.title: The court of law governing the terms is in a jurisdiction that is friendlier to user privacy protection.

tosdr.case: The court of law governing the terms is in a jurisdiction that is friendlier to user privacy protection.
tosdr.tldr: Upcloud's Terms of service state that "the Agreement will be governed by the substantive laws of Finland." Finland has an implementation of the GDPR as well as their own data protections acts.

5742.quoteText: UpCloud does not store personal data longer than is legally permitted and necessary for the purposes of providing the Services or the relevant parts thereof.
5742.title: The service's data retention period is kept to the minimum necessary for fulfilling its purposes

tosdr.case: The service's data retention period is kept to the minimum necessary for fulfilling its purposes

5743.quoteText:
UpCloud will guarantee 100% virtual server and network availability to the Customer.
The network will be deemed available if UpCloud’s routers and switches are available and responding properly.
5743.title: The service guarantees 100% virtual server and network availability to the Customer

tosdr.case: Accessibility to this service is guaranteed at 99% or more
tosdr.tldr: In the Terms of service, Upcloud's Service Level Agreement states that "UpCloud will guarantee 100% virtual server and network availability to the Customer. The network will be deemed available if UpCloud’s routers and switches are available and responding properly."

5745.quoteText: The Customer is not entitled to use the Services for purposes which UpCloud deems to be illegal or offensive
5745.title: Users agree not to use the service for illegal purposes

tosdr.case: Users agree not to use the service for illegal purposes

5747.quoteText:
We store the Users’ personal data primarily within the European Economic Area.
However, we have service providers in several geographical locations.
As such, we and our service providers may transfer personal data to, or access it in, jurisdictions outside the European Economic Area or the User’s domicile.
5747.title: Your data may be processed and stored anywhere in the world

tosdr.case: Your data may be processed and stored anywhere in the world

5748.quoteText: We may process information regarding the use of the Services to improve the quality of our Services e.g. by analysing any trends in the use of our Services. When possible, we will do this using only aggregated, non- personally identifiable data.
5748.title: Your personal data is aggregated into statistics

tosdr.case: Your personal data is aggregated into statistics

5749.quoteText: When possible, we will inform Users about such transfer and processing.
5749.title: The service promises to inform and/or notify users regarding government inquiries that may involve users' personal data

tosdr.case: The service promises to inform and/or notify users regarding government inquiries that may involve users' personal data

5750.quoteText: We may share personal data to authorized service providers who perform services for us (including data storage, sales, marketing and customer support services).
5750.title: Third parties may be involved in operating the service

tosdr.case: Third parties may be involved in operating the service

5751.quoteText: The parties expressly note that the Service is not designed to be error-free or uninterrupted and therefore they are neither intended nor fit for purposes that require fail-safe performance.
5751.title: The service provider makes no warranty regarding uninterrupted, timely, secure or error-free service

tosdr.case: The service provider makes no warranty regarding uninterrupted, timely, secure or error-free service

5752.quoteText: In all other respects the Service is provided on “as-is” and “as-available” basis
5752.title: The service is provided 'as is' and to be used at the users' sole risk

tosdr.case: The service is provided 'as is' and to be used at the users' sole risk

5753.quoteText: For all unscheduled interruptions in the provision of the Services, which are due to hardware or telecommunications failures that last longer than 5 minutes, UpCloud shall offer compensation to the Customer.
5753.title: Users are provided compensation according to Upcloud's service level agreement for any unscheduled interruptions

tosdr.case: Users are entitled to a refund if certain thresholds or standards are not met by the service
tosdr.tldr: The Terms of service state in the Service Level Agreement that "for all unscheduled interruptions in the provision of the Services, which are due to hardware or telecommunications failures that last longer than 5 minutes, UpCloud shall offer compensation to the Customer." Note that there are are situations that will be exempt from UpCloud’s service guarantee.

5754.title: This service does not force users into binding arbitration

tosdr.case: This service does not force users into binding arbitration
tosdr.tldr: The Terms of service do not mention anything about binding arbitration.
